form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R0400 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT FEE STAMP $25 File No. 419475266 FEE PAID Immigration and Naturalization Service No. 1923.24 APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act 245 Philadelphia, Pa. 249 I&N Act Date 4-5-71 Verified by run Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A, B, C, D, E or F) An immigrant visa is immediately available to me: A. As a refugee (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a former fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my arrival in the United States, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Section 214(d), I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above, (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) My alien registration number is Sex PHATAK Male VIMALA VINAYAK A19675266 Female 3. I reside in the United States at: (Apt. No.) (No. and Street) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 6602N 13th ST. PHILADELPHIA PA. 19126 4. Date of Birth Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) I am now a citizen of (Country) 3-19-1909 BARODA GUJARAT INDIA INDIA 5. I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) KENNEDY INT. AIR PORT N.Y. Get. 11th 1970 by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) as a (visitor, student, exchange visitor, temporary worker, fiancee, fiance, crewman, SWISS AIR parolee, etc.) VISITOR was My nonimmigrant visa was issued by the United States Consul at (City) (State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) I inspected. was not BOMBAY INDIA SEPT. 1970 6. I am single married divorced widowed a. I have been married ONE times including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) b. Number of times my spouse has been married C. Name of spouse ONE PHATAK VINAYAK GOVIND d. My spouse resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.) (No. & Street) (Town or City) (Province or State) (Country) 6602N. PHILADELPHIA PA- U.S.A. 7. a. I have THREE children, as follows: (complete all columns as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of child's residence. Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now Living at DR. VISHVANATH V. PHATAK M BARODA-INDIA JULY 9th 1936 6602 N.131s.ST. PHILA. PA. 19126 DR. ANIL v. PHATAK M BARODA- INDIA AUG 75 1939 AVE, 4A. CA. 90025 DR. VILAYA V. PHATAK F BARODA-INDIA NOV-12-1933 660218.13 ST. PHILA. PA. 19126 b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: My HUSBAND 8. I have have not heretofore filed an application for the status of a permanent resident.
